title: Eddie Jones to shuffle England deck as injuries and illness strike
text:
England are expected to make at least seven changes to their starting XV to face France as a sickness bug and injury concerns hit the squad on Tuesday.

Billy Vunipola is almost certain to be unavailable for the final Pool C match, which is scheduled to be played in Yokohama on Saturday, because of an ankle injury he sustained in the first half of the win over Argentina.

A supporter took a photograph of the Saracens No 8 in a medical boot on Monday, just hours after England had said he was walking free and without any support to the ankle.

While England have still to confirm the extent of the injury, it is not thought that it will rule him out of the remainder of the tournament and he is expected...
description: England are expected to make at least seven changes to their starting XV to face France as a sickness bug and injury concerns hit the squad on Tuesday.
